title: AgilePitch - AI Sales Search
description:
Agilepitch is an AI-powered platform for B2B sales teams. Featuring Michael, a decision intelligence AI. Agilepitch enables sales teams to search their entire sales tech stack from 1 platform, surfacing key information instantly and allowing sellers to focus on the human-centric aspects of sales.

- Search for information 
- Build interactive reports and charts
- Close Deals faster by focusing on relationships and customers, not your CRM and spreadsheets.
